name: Happy Plane - Flap the Wings
description:
Leave the skies of Earth and start your journey in the Happy Plane ! Guide your plane through exciting environments and discover unknown worlds of adventure, action, and addictive gameplay!

Features:

-6 fantastic worlds to discover (Giant’s World, Our World, Fantasy World, Zombie World, World of Maze & Our World and beyond)
-30 exciting levels to test your piloting skills and reaction.
- 3 passengers to be saved in each level
-Several lives in each level. A single collision isn't the end of your adventure!
- Simple one touch control to regulate the flight altitude and a throttle lever to get lightning speed out of a plane
-Original and uplifting musical score for a relaxing flight
-Cartoonish and doodle style fantasy illustrations like dragons,mermaids,flying cars,zombies and much more!
-14 Game Center achievements (Giant Savior, Zombie Pilot, Pipes Pilot, Fantazy Savior, and more). Meet the challenge and get them all!

Let the flying adventure begin!
